TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {58622=In 1998, Rhino Records reissued Rock and Roll: Gary Glitter's Greatest Hits with artwork that wasn't quite as silly as its original incarnation, with the intention of snagging sports fans who hold "Rock & Roll, Pt. 2" dear to their hearts. In either incarnation, Rock 'n' Roll is the definitive Gary Glitter collection, containing all of his singles, including "Do You Wanna Touch Me (Oh Yeah!)," "I'm the Leader of the Gang," and "Hello! Hello! I'm Back Again.", 163551=Copyright © 2014 Apple Inc. All rights reserved., 61975=Born: May 8, 1944 in Banbury, Oxfordshire, England}
